Can Indian Economy expect revival despite rising inflation? What do you think are the major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country?

Indian economy is an economy with an high rising prices because competition is more from the outsiders and the agriculture is less in  India. Their is no good agriculture in India. we are getting resources from outsiders at an high cost.

    Now days many outsiders are establishing big malls and their effecting the small shops. prices are rising because their is no proper policies in the society.

   To overcome this necessary steps must be taken that is :

  They must implement new policies to the agricultures for their living. They should adopt new strategies in the economy. They must have good agriculture and industries to develop the economy and  growth in the economy. The quality of goods is low and customers are not satisfied.

    Indian economy needs revival from inflation by increasing financial and productivity in the economy.

 Productivity should be improved and avoid wastage and sell for a reasonable price.
